definitions.definition: To eject something violently (such as lava or water, as from a volcano or geyser).
definitions.example: The volcano erupted, spewing lava across a wide area.

definitions.definition: To burst forth; to break out.
definitions.example: The third molar tooth erupts late in most people, and sometimes does not appear at all.

definitions.definition: To spontaneously release pressure or tension.
